hero.title: Enter the world of Les Crêtes to taste our wines and visit our cellar.

seo.title: Enter the world of Les Crêtes to taste our wines and visit our cellar | Les Crêtes | Winemakers since 1750 | Valle d'Aosta - Italy
seo.description: The Rifugio del Vino and a real terrace on the vineyards overlooking the city of Aosta, a place where hospitality is at home and where you can live a unique experience.

intro.title: Live a unique experience in the heart of Valle d'Aosta
intro.text: The Rifugio del Vino offers breathtaking views like a terrace over the historic Torrette vineyards—a place where hospitality feels at home, and guests can enjoy a unique experience, surrounded by nature and the authentic flavors of Valle d'Aosta.

cards.title: Explore
cards.text: Tastings at Les Crêtes are a journey through the vineyards that embrace the stunning Valle d'Aosta. Immerse yourself in nature and discover the techniques that make our wines unique—a perfect blend of tradition and modernity.

cards.title: Savor
cards.text: Accompanied by industry experts, let yourself be guided through a sensory experience that combines the authentic flavors of our land with our fine wines, offering you unparalleled moments of pleasure.

cards.title: Share
cards.text: Each sip is an emotion worth reliving. Take a bottle of our wines with you to continue experiencing the magic of Les Crêtes, sharing it with those you love.

cards.title: 3 Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of three wines at the Wine Refuge with a guided tour of the cellar

cards.title: 5 Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 local wines at the Wine Refuge, including the cellar and barrel room

cards.title: Wine and Cheese Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 selected wines paired with 6 local cheeses and a guided tour of the cellar and barrel room

cards.title: Picnic at Côteau
cards.descrizione: An immersive experience among the rows of the scenic Côteau La Tour vineyard: an exclusive picnic with a curated selection of cold cuts, cheeses, and three Les Crêtes wines chosen with our winemaker.

cards.title: Top Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 premium wines paired with a board of local delicacies and a guided tour of the cellar and barrel room

cards.title: Sunset at the Refuge
cards.descrizione: A three-stage food and wine journey with tastings paired with selected wines and a guided tour of the cellar.

cards.title: Côteau la Tour Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 wines paired with a board of local gastronomy and a tour of the cellar and barrel room. Vineyard tour of Côteau and toast in the medieval tower.

cards.title: Winemaker's Experience
cards.descrizione: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our winemaker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar.

cards.title: Les Crêtes Under the Stars
cards.descrizione: Dinner on the terrace of the scenic Wine Refuge with pairings of iconic Les Crêtes CRUs

cards.title: Wellness & Wine Tasting
cards.descrizione: One-night stay in a double room at QC Terme Spas & Resorts with wellness path, tasting, and tour of the cellar and barrel room.

trewines.name: 3 Wines Experience
trewines.title: trewines
trewines.cardDesc: Tasting of three wines at the Wine Refuge and visit to the cellar and the wine cellar

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Take a first step into the world of Les Crêtes to discover its history, territory, vines and wines. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you can taste three wines with a view over the vineyards, after visiting the cellar and the wine cellar.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 3 wines
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

fivewines.name: 5 Wines Experience
fivewines.title: fivewines
fivewines.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 wines from the territory at the wine refuge in the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Experience a journey in the world of wine Les Crêtes that from native wines goes back to history, to the territory, to its ancestral vines. In the setting of the Wine Refuge, after visiting the cellar and the barricaia, You will taste the local wines with a view of the vineyards and you can choose to combine them with our selection of charcuterie and cheeses from the local gastronomy.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 wines
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

opzione.title: As an option with this tasting:
opzione.uno: Our selection of cold cuts and cheeses from the local gastronomy at an additional cost of € 14.00 pax incl.

opzione.title: Optional with this tasting
opzione.content: Our selection of local cured meats and cheeses for an additional cost of €14.00 including VAT per person

cheese.name: Wine and Cheese Experience
cheese.title: cheese
cheese.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 selected wines in combination with 6 local cheeses and visit to the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Enter the world of Les Crêtes to discover its history, the territory and its vines in a gastronomic journey that sees wine and cheese as protagonists. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino you can taste a selection of our wines, each in combination with a fine local cheese, accompanied by mountain honey.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

picnicalcoteau.name: Picnic at Côteau
picnicalcoteau.title: picnicalcoteau
picnicalcoteau.cardDesc: An immersive experience among the rows of the scenic Côteau La Tour vineyard: an exclusive picnic accompanied by a curated selection of cold cuts, cheeses, and three Les Crêtes wines chosen together with our winemaker.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 3 wines + local cheeses and cold cuts

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: An immersive experience among the rows of the scenic Côteau La Tour vineyard: an exclusive picnic accompanied by a curated selection of cold cuts, cheeses, and three Les Crêtes wines chosen together with our winemaker.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 3 wines selected with the winemaker
- The set includes a picnic blanket and a basket with a selection of cold cuts and cheeses, various types of bread and breadsticks, and a single-serving dessert

top.name: Top Wines Experience
top.title: top
top.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 top wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit to the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: For wine lovers and experts, 5 prestigious Les Crêtes labels to taste in the setting of the Rifugio del Vino, enjoying, with a view over the vineyards, The pairing of a selection of charcuterie and fine cheeses from local gastronomy, after the dedicated guided tour.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 top wines agreed with our Sommelier *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia
- Our selection of local delicacies and cheeses

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

tramontoalrifugio.name: Sunset at the Refuge
tramontoalrifugio.title: tramontoalrifugio
tramontoalrifugio.cardDesc: A three-stop food and wine journey, with tastings paired with selected wines and a guided tour of the winery.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 3 wines + local cheeses and cold cuts

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: A three-stop food and wine journey, both inside and outside our facility, designed to offer a unique experience combining flavor and local tradition. Each stop will feature a pairing of top-quality cheeses and cured meats with small warm dishes inspired by local culinary heritage, all expertly selected. The experience will be accompanied by three of our wines, carefully chosen to enhance the flavors of each product we’ve selected. The evening also includes a visit to the winery with a presentation of our products and production process.

lista.testo: - 3 Les Crêtes wines from our curated selections
- 3 tasting stations with cheeses, cured meats, and traditional warm dishes

tour.name: Côteau la Tour Experience
tour.title: tour
tour.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit in the cellar and barricaia. Tour of the Côteau vineyard and toast in the Medieval Tower

visita.title: Winery tour
visita.cantina: yes + visit to the vineyards of Côteau la Tour

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Travel through the world of Les Crêtes, immersing yourself in the colours, scents and history of the Côteau la Tour vineyard, guarded by its medieval tower that dominates the landscape, Unveiling a breathtaking view. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you can also taste wines paired with our selection of local salami and cheese.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia
- Visit to the vineyards of Côteau la Tour with toast in the Medieval Tower (recommended the use of comfortable shoes)
- Board of cold cuts and cheeses from the local gastronomy

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

winemaker.name: Winemaker's Experience
winemaker.title: winemaker
winemaker.cardDesc: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our wine maker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 5 wines + local cold cuts and cheeses

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our wine maker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar following the path that leads our grapes to the bottle. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you will taste wines chosen with the winemaker, combined with a selection of cold cuts and cheeses from local gastronomy.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 wines chosen with the winemaker
- Visit to the cellar and barrel tasting
- Visit to the vineyard (recommended wearing comfortable shoes)
- Selection of local salami and cheese

sottolestelle.name: Les Crêtes Under the Stars
sottolestelle.title: sottolestelle
sottolestelle.cardDesc: Dinner on the terrace of the enchanting Wine Refuge paired with Les Crêtes’ iconic CRU wines.

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: In the enchanting setting of the Rifugio del Vino terrace, we invite you to an exclusive Wine Dinner dedicated to our finest Crus. A special evening featuring gourmet dishes paired with our exceptional wines, to be enjoyed under a starry sky and surrounded by the beloved mountains that define our landscape. A one-of-a-kind experience of flavors, aromas, and wishes whispered under the stars.

content.title: Welcome amuse-bouche
content.description: Paired with our Metodo Classico sparkling wine

content.title: Starter
content.description:
Poached egg on a bed of seared zucchini, with a light Parmigiano Reggiano fondue and crispy bacon.
Paired with our Chardonnay Cuvée Bois 2023

content.title: First course
content.description:
Carnaroli risotto with fava bean pesto, drops of stracciatella, and speck powder.
Paired with our Petite Arvine Fleur 2024.

content.title: Main course
content.description:
Rabbit roll with a rich brown stock, Taggiasca olive pesto, and a small summer salad.
Paired with our Nebbiolo Sommet 2021.

content.title: Dessert
content.description:
Sacher Torte with fresh raspberry coulis.
Paired with our limited edition Sabla 50.

wellness.name: Wellness & Wine Tasting
wellness.title: wellness
wellness.cardDesc: One night stay in a double room at QC Terme Spas & Resorts, with wellness path + tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses, visit to the cellar and barricaia.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 5 wines + local cold cuts and cheeses

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Immerse yourself in the charm of an authentic culinary tradition, where genuine flavors are the undisputed protagonists. The Aosta Valley is a true paradise for lovers of good food and wine, with the possibility to taste excellent local wines. And to make your stay even more memorable, treat yourself to a suggestive wellness path, surrounded by panoramic baths and cozy relaxation rooms.

lista.testo: - Stay in double room and rich breakfast
- Entrance to the hotel wellness path directly from your room in a bathrobe
- Tasting of 5 selected wines paired with 6 local cheeses at the Les Crêtes winery

wellness.prenotaTitle: The booking for this tasting with wellness path is made directly on the platform of the QC Terme hotel.

prenota.title: Book the experience that suits you best!
prenota.text: We look forward to welcoming you and letting you discover the world of Les Crêtes, told through our wines and our story.

cards.title: Groups and Events
cards.text: If you have specific needs for yourself or your group, contact us to create your personalized visit.

cards.title: Gift Voucher
cards.text: Surprise someone special with a gift voucher to experience an authentic visit to the Wine Refuge.

etiquette.title: Winery Etiquette
etiquette.text: Visits and tastings are available by reservation only. Walk-in requests can only be accommodated based on availability at the time.
etiquette.p: To provide our guests with the best possible experience, we kindly ask that a few simple guidelines be followed.

list.text: - Children: If you will be accompanied by your little ones, please indicate this in the appropriate field when making your reservation or contact us to better organize your experience at Les Cretes in the dedicated children's area.
- Pets: Small-sized four-legged friends are welcome, but for more information, please contact us.

banner.title: Il Rifugio del Vino: emotional tasting room
banner.paragraph: A place where hospitality is at home and where you can live a unique experience in the mountains of Valle d'Aosta.
